entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain. High 9.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High 9. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Clearing. High 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 6. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023
